content: this legal text provides a summary of the progress of a divorce case between two parties referred to as jm and om the court has made a final decision referred to as court dec but the details of the decision are not provided the joint assets and liabilities of the parties have been identified including a coowned property shares in two companies and movable properties the court has decided to divide the assets and liabilities between the parties with one party taking sole ownership of the coowned property and shares the court has specified the amount to be compensated by one party to the other there is a deadline for voluntary compliance with the judgment and the possibility of selling jointly owned movable properties through a public auction the court has allowed for the transfer of the coowned property title to one party the land register has made a new entry reflecting the change in ownership om has filed a lawsuit requesting the division of joint property and the payment of maintenance the court will determine the division of the property and the amount of maintenance to be paid based on the evidence presented by the parties the defendants bank accounts and financial situation have been examined the defendant claims to receive a salary from russia and objects to the plaintiffs claim the plaintiff claims that their health condition prevents them from working and earning a living the court will determine if the plaintiff is eligible for alimony the court also discusses the division of joint property and obligations between the parties based on applicable laws the court calculates the value of the parties assets and determines the amount each party is entitled to receive the court also addresses the parties obligations to a bank and determines the amount each party is responsible for the court has ordered one party to pay the other a specific amount of money and has given a deadline for payment the court has allowed for the sale of movable property through a public auction the text also mentions a maintenance claim and loan payments made by one party to a bank the court is evaluating the evidence collected in the case including an employment contract for manicure and pedicure services the court needs to determine if the plaintiffs claim for maintenance is justified and if the defendant is able to provide it the court refers to the civil code and the tsms to calculate the price of the case and allocate the procedural costs the exact amount of the procedural costs is not mentioned in the text
